name: Skulls & Mines
description:
• Blow up the flying skulls
  • Don't blow yourself up
  • Don't fall of the edge
  • Don't get eaten by the skulls.

A game I made for an exercise where you had to create 5 increasingly difficult levels with only a single variable changed between them.

It was a lot of fun, and I'm very happy with how this turned out

The game is also available as a standalone .exe file which you can download.

Thanks for checking out my game! :)

CONTROLS:

  • Movement - WASD / Arrow Keys / Left Joystick
  • Placing Mine - Z / A on Gamepad
  • Detonating Mine - X / B on Gamepad
  • Mute All  Sound - M
  • Mute Music - N
  • Mute SFX - B

Game Design, Programming, Art, Music, and Sound Effect all made by me.
